reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've not written a review on trip advisor for some time, but couldn't not review this hotel. Whilst the room we stayed in was very clean and the hotel itself was in a great location, it was all looking very tired. Some walls were missing wallpaper, the matress on our bed must have been 20 years old and the breakfast was awful. The hotel is just very slapdash and basic. Check out the photos that have been posted by another user, because that's exactly what the hotel is like. You should stay at the newly opened Lorne Hotel next door. I wish we had!
reviews.title: Devon NO! NO! NO!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights at a reduced rate which made it very good value. Very smart reception area but the stairwell was very unpleasant, thankfully the lift was close by. The room was spacious and clean if decor a little scruffy and jaded. The bathroom was small but modern and clean with lots of hot water. The staff, both at reception and breakfast, were welcoming and attentive and the breakfast tasty but only served up to 9am. The hotel was in a nice location, within easy walking distance of the city centre and close to Kelvingrove Park with a good selection of restaurants nearby. Having free parking at the hotel was great. I would stay here again but only if reduced rates were available, not at full prices..
reviews.title: A clean, friendly hotel in good location with free parking, good value at £39 a night B & B but overpriced at full rate.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: I read some reveiws i did not find anything wrong with this hotel and for the price it was great,noisy geusts are not the hotels fault just ignorant people.My wife and i went to tennerife one jannuary for a week at £5oo a night and we had to put up with 560 IT consultants who had a phone in one hand and a beer in the other,the heated swimming pool was a mass of naked bodies.This rutting ritual started at midnight until 5 am for four nights,i am sure their boyfriends,girlfriends,husbands,or wives,would have not allowed this to happen had they been there,all the managment said when we complained was they had been paid well to host a convention and they needed the money
reviews.title: Clean Warm Good Location From the Panama Hat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Read the reviews before I went but after I'd already booked, was a bit wary but thought they were exaggerated. Then I tried to check in, which didn't open until 40 mins later than the check in time and then only did because another guest caused such a scene! All the money has been spent on the reception and bar area which makes you think you are in a luxury hotel, then you go into your room. OH my God!!!! Peeling paper, no bigger than a postage stamp and walls are paper thin!!!! Free WiFi? If you manage to get on to it, which didn't happen for me. Breakfast left me feeling hungrier than before I went in, A total disappointment, with very rude and unhelpful staff, please take heed of the reviews, I didnt and paid the price. Beware!!!
reviews.title: Thought people were exaggerating , but they were right!!!! Bad, Bad, Bad!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: I arrived at the hotel on the main street - it was a beautiful building on a busy main road. The plants outside had seen better days. However, the reception area was clean and set on marble floor. There was a small bar to the right and a seating area by the window and a restaurant to the left. The building was in the process of being decorated in some areas and so called finished in others.
reviews.title: Never again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: I have just come back from a weekend business trip, and have to say I was worried about staying here due to some of the reviews.
reviews.title: Devoncove - Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009
reviews.text: However what I found was a great hotel, frendly staff and good value for money with a great breakfast!! The room I had was super all you need for a good nights sleep and very clean. The main bar area is also very nice and the free WIFI is also a great help.
reviews.title: Some staff need a serious kick in the bum (I was not allowed to say a*rse)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Please note this is a family run hotel so if you are looking for a place to stay that gives you a real welcome and not some faceless hotel chain this is the place for you.
reviews.title: Very poor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great wee place I will be back.
reviews.title: Reasonable, clean and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The receptionist needs to be replaced - period. I told the gorgeous manageress this after a fiasco involving my room being flooded by the room above. Reception were useless.
reviews.title: Not very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: beautiful hotel, very clean, spacious luxury rooms, quite inexpensive, located on a main street with public transportation, very close to University, within walking distance of downtown (10-15 minutes), very friendly staff. I just liked everything about this hotel.
reviews.title: highly recommend it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't believe all the poor reviews about this hotel. We had a nice quiet clean room and a very good Scottish breakfast included. Free Internet service with a strong signal right in our room, this place is good value. Nice bar with draft beer and half bottles of decent wine at a good price to drink in the comfortable lounge.
reviews.title: Nice friendly place, clean and good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Convenient location with the 747 airport bus stop right outside. Great for an overnight stop before or after a transatlantic flight. I have booked it again for the night before our flight back to the US.
reviews.title: Never Again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PS If you like Indian food, the Rahn of Lamb for two at Mother India on the next block is to die for.....
reviews.title: Very disappointing- don't let the modern looking foyer and bar fool you!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Myself and my husband picked this hotel as it was the cheapest by far. And the pictures shown made it look very nice. However when you get past reception and up to the rooms, you find somewhere which hasn't had alot of attention to detail or general cleanliness. There was mould in the bathroom, missing sink plugs. Wood round the bath was coming away from the bath itself. We were actually only there for one night- thankfuly. And although breakfast was included, we didn't even bother. We had to be out by 9am!!! So we just got up and left promptly. The only good point was the help from the staff. A gentleman who was very helpful about getting taxis near by. We paid £65 for one night breakfast inc. oh, and there is a car park at the rear of hotel, but wasn't any room left. We found it better to park at the front of hotel as we could see our car from our window.
reviews.title: welcoming and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: i booked this hotel, as i was going to the secc and being not far away i thought greatr.then read some reviews, hmmm?mixed bag really.ok, where to start?renovations;-stair case needs finishing, could do with new windows throughout, shower couldve been cleaner-nail varnish(?) all over it,lumpy bed-but comfortable, cold room.
reviews.title: devoncove?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: positives;-1 night stay £39,so not bad, clean enough, nice entrance and lounge area, clean towels,spacious room, location ok, but i think the highlight was the dark haired receptionist-stunning!!!(although a smile would be nice to see)she was gorgeous mind!
reviews.title: Boutique hotel? You must be joking!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: made worth the stay, just to see her in the mornings...shame it was only at reception!!!
reviews.title: Always take reviews with a pinch of salt

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: over all, id stay again, no real issues that were too concerning....
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would rate this hotel as a two star hostel.
reviews.title: Pleasant
